idea: At a time when technology is thriving at a lightning speed, businesses are looking for resources who are single-handed, proficient with all necessary skills that are needed to bring your ideas, your aspirations into reality. With Full Stack development as the latest mantra today, Viyers IT Solutions offers Full Stack development services, which include frontend, backend, database management and all that it takes for a complete development setup. As a Full Stack development company, we ensure that our Full Stack developers are all set to assist you with needed expertise in all areas, identifying roles and responsibilities with corresponding challenges attached along with.
name: Viyers IT Solutions

idea:
JAKS GYM INDIA PVT. LTD. Is established in March 2021, to serve the Indian fitness industries by setting up Make in India products for commercial health clubs, corporate, hotels, public institution (school, universities and others), home gyms, home consumer, other commercial user, corporate office, hospitals.

Our business model supports to youths of India by making them entrepreneur, for developing fitness training skills. Our trained entrepreneur helps to serve the people improving physical fitness and enhance there general health.

By understanding the need of fitness industry we train our fitness professional about Exercise Science that provides comprehensive theoretical and practical education with the specialize skills such as Fitness instructor, Personal trainer, Nutritionist, Sports Coach, fitness counsellor, Sports promoter, Sports event planner, Fitness and Health Researcher, Sports Journalist, fitness manger, equipment technician, manufacturer, Owner of Fitness Centre, Gym Franchisee and studio etc. We strongly support Skill India.

There is big demand and need in Indian fitness industry, which has seen very rapid growth year after years. Hence we are putting our best professional experience and expertise from over the years.

VISION

 “JAKS reach to Indian fitness professional’s for quality, commitment, education and service facilities to help them to reach their goals.”

MISSION

“SPREDING FITNESS IN INDIA BY SUPPORTING FIT INDIA.

“ONE STOP FOR INDIA’S FITNESS NEED.”
name: JAKS GYM INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: WE ARE WORKING WITH INDIAN RAILWAY FOR CONTRACTING WORK OF ELECTRICAL , MECHANICAL, AND OTHER MESCELLANEOUS WORKS
name: contracting work in INDIAN RAILWAY

idea: Using reliable real estate consulting services, technology, outstanding consumer service, brand equity, and innovation, Sri Prince Multiventure Private Limited strives to provide the same experience to all of its customers. Customer satisfaction, a strong entrepreneurial spirit, knowledge, and trust are important to us. We are a young and energetic group of professionals. What we all have in common is that we're all passionate about creating the finest possible home-buying experience for our clients. A wide range of real estate services, including the sale of homes, are available through us. We make it possible for users and local suppliers to include their properties and projects on the website, resulting in a significant increase in business inquiries and leads for the users who are listed on the platform.
name: SRI PRINCE MULTIVENTURE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a leading Hair Extensions brand in India offering 100% Natural Human Hair. With humble beginnings as a local wig supplier, we have now evolved into a globally reputed company.

Our company has specialised itself in a variety of services including manufacturing, exporting, marketing and distributing all types of hair including Hair Extensions, Hair Wigs, Hair Toppers, Hair Wefts, Training Heads and much more.
name: The Gorgeous Hair

idea: Sechome is a SaaS-based startup working on developing a crime prevention tool for Police. Currently, there is a lot of inefficiency in some Police processes like Police background verification which can be helped with technology. This process is used by various security agencies in India like at airports, Police verification in passports, Job verification, etc.
name: Sechome

idea: SWIFFRRO is an online application platform for life coaches. At this platform life coaches and clients can connect directly from the any corner, from any country. Life coach is divided into various niches like business coach, relationship coach, career coach, spiritual coach, health and wellness coach etc. Swiffrro provides the verified and experienced coaches to their clients. Swiffrro connect life coach and their client to solve clients problem or achieve their goals.
name: Swiffrro

idea:
Imbellire Business Solutions Pvt. Ltd- IBS is one of the leading Facility Management company in the market. The ability to integrate and self deliver services is the key to providing cost effective workflow and high quality service had kept us ahead in the market. For the customer, this creates cost efficiency within the organization and complies with the Service Level Agreement according to the customer’s demands. IBS approach to organize Facility Management is through an integrated structure where services are offered through a flawless integration of people, processes and systems.

 

 By bundling services we are able to reduce overheads and allocate resources more efficiently.


 We understand that a few organizations may want to outsource the total range of facility services, at the same time as others have a smaller outsourcing need. We deliver a wide range of support services which can be combined in numerous ways according to the customer’s needs. Creating a flexible, transparent and tailor-made solution in close dialogue with the customer, based essentially on standard procedures and modules, enables the customer to scale services to meet changing needs.
name: IMBELLIRE BUSINESS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Quron is a healthcare aggregator that was started with one clear target, to create solutions in the healthcare industry. We looked at the expanding space and the evergrowing demand and realised that honest and simple solutions can bring about great efficiencies and accuracy. We are driven to achieve this because we firmly believe that long lasting change can only be achieved by creating positive impacts for both, our network of partnered labs and our customers.
name: Quron Health Solutions

idea: Atroads app offers mobility solutions by connecting customers to drivers with vehicles across bikes, auto-rickshaws, and cabs also travelling on the same route share rides, share commuting costs, reduce traffic and pollution, all the same time.
name: Atroads technologies private limited
